short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to find your work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Greatsby brings all your work in one place and shows it in your new tab.
Greatsby will group your work by day, week, and month, tabulate it and give you powerful tools for fast search.

The extension allows you:

- Shows your history in one page
- Splitting your history by product
- Searching and filtering your work

About permissions
"Read your browsing history": greatsby needs this to import your work from your history so everything you need is already there on install.
"Replace the page that you see when opening a new tab": greatsby needs this to show your work in your new tab so it's always at your fingertips.
